summary: I CRANKED UP MY CAR IN MY DRIVEWAY AND THE POWER STEERING ASSIST FAULT LIGHT CAME ON.  I HAD NO POWER STEERING.  I RESET IT BY TURNING THE ENGINE OFF AND THEN BACK ON.  I DID THIS SINCE FEBRUARY BUT NOW TURNING THE ENGINE OFF AND ON NO LONGER RESETS IT.  APPARENTLY, THERE IS NO RECALL FOR THIS AND I WAS QUOTED A PRICE OF $1599 TO INSTALL A NEW RACK.  .
